description: Juan Marcelo Hernández Herrero aka Jota Herrero grew in the south of Buenos Aires Autumn City, Argentina. After playing drums for 12 years and influenced by Latin Vox Machine production members, he decided to bevome a music producer in the vast hip hop world maxing Trap, Rap, RnB, Metal and other music styles. At his 28 years old released a 2018 single called MUERTE FC, which states his political criticism as a strong pillar embodying it in some of his lyrics
